IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT

WATCH THIS SPACE!
Here's the thing, in the "current political climate" solar farms are a losing bet...bad news for mega, corporate... government-handout-speculators for lack of a better description...GREAT NEWS for off-gridders, DIY-ers, homesteaders, CITY-homestraders...you know, regular people.

People like you and me who stare at solar panels in people's backyards, on their roofs, on businesses, churches and warehouses...

Just wait, I have now hammered out the details to get these panels in YOUR backyard, or on on your roof...the savings---I always pass on to you---opens up many more applications that didn't used to make "cents-sense".

The faster we install these types of systems, the harder it will be for the utility companies to take total control over our solar energy. It's YOUR solar energy, not theirs.

No, don't wait. Are we on same page, reading the same script? Call me now, today, when you get a break, let me know you're a distributed energy guy, or gal, like me and you're on my short list.

John Kimball Solar.
The original Sun Electronics International.
Find me at sunelec.com.
Call me at (305) 498-1863 and (520) 738-1760.
Text me at (305) 498-1863 and (520) 738-1760.
24/7/365

Enough for now, I gotta get back on the road...

HOT HOT HOT
Don't let the sun abuse you this summer. Instead make hay Â and stay cool with a SOLAR AIR CONDITIONING, latest technology hybrid, Â AC/DC system. John Kimball Solar now includes air conditioning. Never Â have to pay for air conditioning again.Â 

Call me---John Kimball, owner of the original Sun Â Electronics International---now, or later today, or tomorrow, but as Â soon as you can.Â 

I got one. I installed it. It works great.Â 

I am now having these units shipped to the United States. Â There is only a 30% duty on tariffs which is covered by the tax credit.Â 

There's a limited number of these units available to me due Â to the mass demand. Send me 10% to lock down your early position in the Â shipping schedule.Â 

I know your pocket book is hurting and your air conditioner Â uses the most electricity in your house so I am giving you a special Â price to help you substantially reduce your electric bill---and to Â continue to offer the World's Lowest Prices in Solar.Â 

John Kimball Solar.

IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT

WATCH THIS SPACE!
Here's the thing, in the "current political climate" solar farms are a losing bet...bad news for mega, corporate... government-handout-speculators for lack of a better description...GREAT NEWS for off-gridders, DIY-ers, homesteaders, CITY-homestraders...you know, regular people.

People like you and me who stare at solar panels in people's backyards, on their roofs, on businesses, churches and warehouses...

Just wait, I have now hammered out the details to get these panels in YOUR backyard, or on on your roof...the savings---I always pass on to you---opens up many more applications that didn't used to make "cents-sense".

The faster we install these types of systems, the harder it will be for the utility companies to take total control over our solar energy. It's YOUR solar energy, not theirs.

No, don't wait. Are we on same page, reading the same script? Call me now, today, when you get a break, let me know you're a distributed energy guy, or gal, like me and you're on my short list.

I got one. I installed it. It works great.Â 

I am now having these units shipped to the United States. Â There is only a 30% duty on tariffs which is covered by the tax credit.Â 

There's a limited number of these units available to me due Â to the mass demand. Send me 10% to lock down your early position in the Â shipping schedule.Â 

I know your pocket book is hurting and your air conditioner Â uses the most electricity in your house so I am giving you a special Â price to help you substantially reduce your electric bill---and to Â continue to offer the World's Lowest Prices in Solar.Â
